thread.title: Loja cyclists compete in South American and Ibero-American BMX in Peru –
thread.title_full: Loja cyclists compete in South American and Ibero-American BMX in Peru –

author: archyworldyscom
title: Loja cyclists compete in South American and Ibero-American BMX in Peru –
text:
The Ecuadorian Cycling Federation invites cyclists from High Performance Clubs, Training Clubs, Provincial Federations, and Brand Teams to participate in the South American BMX Championship and the Ibero-American BMX Championship, which will take place in Lima-Peru from September 7 to 8, 2024, on the track of the San Miguel district, Playas Costa Verde circuit.
The Loja team, which will represent our country in this international event, is composed of Juan Sebastián Andrade Alvear (5 years Walbike), José David Guamán Gordillo (5 years Walbike) and Max Emiliano Landázuri Rojas (4 years Walbike); Prof. Israel Guarnizo Espinosa, coach of Fedeloja Cycling, joins the delegation for technical assistance.
The Organizing Committee expects the participation of Steel Horse lovers in the following categories: Standard Bicycle Hoop 20” (Challenger, Championship, master); Cruise 24 (Boys, Men, Girls, Women); Promotional Category (Small Pieces and Newbies). The technical meeting will take place on Friday, September 6th, starting at 3:00 p.m., while the competitions will take place on September 7th (South American Championship) and September 8th (Ibero-American Championship). (D)
